# Orchestrate & Verify

Read:
- `agent-os/specs/<feature>/ACCEPTANCE.md`
- Implemented files & tests
- `agent-os/standards/*`

Do:
- Emit `verification.md` with pass/fail per acceptance item, evidence (file + test), gaps, and prioritized next steps.
**No code.**
